/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is framed by concrete overpasses on either side, their curved arches adding an architectural interest to the cityscape. Cars and buses traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the scene. In the distance, buildings rise, their details softened by the distance. The image is bathed in the light of a sunny day, casting shadows and highlighting the textures of the concrete structures.
